name: christmas pickle
sizes_available: sizes will vary depending on your own tension
notes:
**add a christmas pickle to your tree this year and add a fun holiday tradition to your family! this pattern is worked in a continuous round. your finished plush should measure approx. 4‚Äù tall depending on your tension and yarn choice.**

***materials:***
premier basix chenille brights super bulky in emerald (approx. 12 yds)
h(5 mm) hook
scissors
needle
poly-fil stuffing

***abbreviations(us terms):***
mr = magic ring
sts = stitches
st = stitch
sl= slip stitch
ch = chain
sc = single crochet
inc = place 2 sts in one st
dec = invisible sc the next 2 sts together
